text: Spring on Zarechnaya Street () is a 1956 Soviet drama movie directed by Feliks Mironer and Marlen Khutsiev.Весна на Заречной улицеПоследняя карнавальная ночь Юрия Белова. Актера не могли похоронить 9 дней It stars Nina Ivanova, Nikolai Rybnikov, and Vladimir Gulyaev. ==Actors== *Nina Ivanova - Tatyana Levchenko, teacher of Russian language and literature *Nikolai Rybnikov - Sasha Savchenko, the foremost steelman *Vladimir Gulyaev - Yura Zhurchenko, Sasha's friend *Yuri Belov - Zhenya Ishchenko *Valentina Pugacheva - Zina *Marina Gavrilko - Marya Gavrilovna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Marlen Khutsiev
title: Spring on Zarechnaya Street
